summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5151 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Graham Street to West Morgan Street, and certain parts of certain other street and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 59460, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
